docs.lead_paragraph: In 1967, South Vietnam had a chance at democratic stability. Instead, two rival generals tore it apart.
docs.snippet: In 1967, South Vietnam had a chance at democratic stability. Instead, two rival generals tore it apart....

docs.lead_paragraph: The New South Wales Waratahs' preparations for their Super Rugby clash against the Lions on Saturday have been thrown into disarray with late injuries to Wallabies scrumhalf Nick Phipps and lock Will Skelton.

headline.print_headline: Waratahs Suffer Double Injury Blow Before Lions Clash
headline.main: Waratahs Suffer Double Injury Blow Before Lions Clash

docs.snippet: The New South Wales Waratahs' preparations for their Super Rugby clash against the Lions on Saturday have been thrown into disarray with late injuries to Wallabies scrumhalf Nick Phipps and lock Will Skelton....

docs.lead_paragraph: An Oregon family that lost six people, including five children, in a fatal fire will donate the organs of the mother and her 13-year-old son.

headline.print_headline: Family to Donate Organs of Victims in Fatal Oregon Fire
headline.main: Family to Donate Organs of Victims in Fatal Oregon Fire

docs.lead_paragraph: Staffan de Mistura, the United Nations envoy, said talks in Geneva had produced a “clear agenda” for the first time to resolve the six-year-old war.

headline.print_headline: Progress Is Reported in Talks on Syria
headline.main: U.N. Syria Mediator Reports Some Progress in Peace Talks

docs.lead_paragraph: A Tennessee man has been arrested on assault charges in connection with a traffic stop that ended with troopers shooting and wounding him.

docs.lead_paragraph: Jordin Canada scored 24 points, Nicole Kornet scored 12 of her 16 points in the first half, and No. 15 UCLA used a huge first quarter to beat Arizona State 77-68 in the Pac-12 Tournament quarterfinals on Friday.

headline.print_headline: Jordin Canada Leads No. 15 UCLA Past Arizona State 77-68
headline.main: Jordin Canada Leads No. 15 UCLA Past Arizona State 77-68

docs.lead_paragraph: After years of prep work, Gov. Jerry Brown's finance department decided Friday that California's $64 billion high-speed rail project is ready to lay some track.

docs.lead_paragraph: A defense lawyer in Texas says federal immigration agents detained one of his clients as he appeared for a routine court date on two misdemeanor charges.

docs.lead_paragraph: The president of Middlebury College issued an apology after students shouted down the speaker, Charles Murray, at an event that then turned violent.

headline.main: Protesters Disrupt Speech by ‘Bell Curve’ Author at Vermont College
